org.mfg.mdb.compiler

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.AbstractSequentialList<E>
          • java.util.LinkedList<Column>
            • org.mfg.mdb.compiler.Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Column>, java.util.Collection<Column>, java.util.Deque<Column>, java.util.List<Column>, java.util.Queue<Column>, org.json.JSONString, org.mfg.mdb.compiler.internal.IJSON

    public class Table
extends java.util.LinkedList<Column>
implements org.mfg.mdb.compiler.internal.IJSON
    Definition of a table. Can be used by external tools like schema editors.
    Author:
    arian
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • computeSignature

        public java.lang.String computeSignature()
        Compute the signature of this table. A signature is formed by the name of the columns and his types. The signature is used to check if an old MDB file is yet compatible with the current version of the schema.
        Returns:
        The table signature.
